recipes.title: Pasta Carbonara
recipes.author: Chef Mario
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook pasta
2. Fry pancetta
3. Mix eggs with cheese
4. Combine everything

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.author: Chef Luigi
recipes.description: Quick and healthy vegetable stir fry with tofu
recipes.instructions:
1. Chop vegetables
2. Press tofu
3. Stir fry everything
4. Add sauce
